exec_brief: At 2025-10-30T15:54:58.170518Z, the us-east-dc1 facility experienced instability on rack R12, resulting in partial service degradation on east-app-cluster. Power/cooling were stabilized and 5/12 VMs online. A follow-up update will be provided after full service validation.
tech_notes:
- Rack R12 in us-east-dc1 reported power dip / cooling spike (max 89°C)
- Hypervisor hv-east-03: VM recovery 5/12 VMs online
- east-app-cluster impact: partial service degradation
- Next 30m focus: continue VM bring-up on hv-east-03, validate service SLOs
- Escalation severity: critical
